radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates increased echogenicity, compatible with fatty deposition. No focal hepatic lesion seen. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary duct dilatation. CBD is of normal caliber measuring 4 mm. The portal vein is patent demonstrating hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder is incompletely distended. There is no gallbladder wall edema or pericholecystic fluid collection to suggest acute inflammation. The pancreas is largely obscured by overlying bowel gas. There is no ascites.
